function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Workforce and workplace health and safety protocols not being followed","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance to regulatory and health protection agencies","category":"Regulatory Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe onsite living environment and medical assistance","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizations unable to meet the basic physiological needs of their workforce, including health and safety, job security, and financial stress.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of screening for vendors and visitors","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of familiarity with company policies and relevant legislation","category":"Regulatory Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity around what constitutes acceptable reasons for absence may lead to employees with contagious diseases coming to work.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on non-essential travel may result in employees traveling to high-risk areas and bringing contagious diseases back to the workplace.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person meetings and training pose a risk of contagious disease transmission due to close contact and shared spaces.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employee entertainment events with communal sharing of food and social gatherings pose a risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of necessary supplies and cleanliness protocols pose a risk of contagious disease transmission and inadequate containment practices.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of centralized document access and communication may lead to inconsistent understanding of protective measures and infection transmission.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees returning to the workplace without proper training on new work and cleaning procedures.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Working in pairs or groups without proper precautions and prevention measures.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated resources to manage prevention measures and ensure compliance.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive safety and hygiene training for employees","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures and guest contact protocols","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient food safety standards and protocols","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of hygiene and cleanliness standards in hotels.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of resort operations leading to under-occupancy and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of employee initiatives and strategic plans on disease transmission risk within the built environment","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on contagious disease prevention","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for handling employee illness and isolation","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hygiene measures in the workplace","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of financial resources for community consolidation and access to information","category":"Social and Economic Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social protection for low-paid insecure workers","category":"Social and Economic Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of protective equipment for at-risk workers","category":"Occupational Health and Safety","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and poor living conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste disposal posing biohazard risks, including potential transmission of covid-19","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges around space, water, and sanitation in informal settlements increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements are at risk of eviction, leading to increased vulnerability to covid-19","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality and poverty leading to varied vulnerability profiles in informal settlements","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and sanitation in informal urban settlements","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to basic services and public health interventions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of formal data sources in informal settlements","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation in settlements","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short and long-term mental health challenges for people with mental health problems and frontline responders.","category":"Mental Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insecurity and threats of eviction for tenants in informal settlements, exacerbated by the pandemic.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to food due to movement restrictions and closure of markets and food vendors","category":"Food Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic vulnerabilities in informal settlements including health, social, natural, and infrastructural issues","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ventilation increasing transmission risk","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and handwashing facilities","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of undetected and poorly managed chronic conditions in communities, increasing the risk of large numbers of people being at risk.","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population and housing density in informal settlements leading to increased opportunities for social mixing and limited options for physical distancing.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High prevalence of chronic conditions in informal settlements","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"}]}
